title: Creative Strategist Ecommerce brand
job_overview:
???? Creative Strategist – Brand & Performance Concepts

We’re looking for a Creative Strategist who knows how to turn insights into scroll-stopping ideas. Someone who’s worked at agencies and understands both branding and performance.

You’ll work closely with our founders and graphic designers to develop concepts that not only look good but convert. From the first spark of an idea to the ad copy and storyboards; you own the creative direction.

We are looking for someone for around 20 hours a week with a possibility to increase to full time, you will earn up to $6/hour, depending on experience.

Please watch the Loom video to know more about the job and the instructions on how to apply: Upgrade to see actual info

Kind regards,
Tom :)
